sources.title: Emergency Call
sources.description: Title: Emergency Call Summary: An expose of the racketeering "accident victims" who extort millions of dollars annually from American automobile owners, insurance companies and property owners by staging fake accident ... Directed by: Edward L. Cahn Actors: Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 26 May 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An expose of the racketeering "accident victims" who extort millions of dollars annually from American automobile owners, insurance companies and property owners by staging fake accident with paid-witnesses standing by to serve in court trials if needed. After a few examples, this one concentrates on the 'gutter-floppers."

metadata.Plot: An expose of the racketeering "accident victims" who extort millions of dollars annually from American automobile owners, insurance companies and property owners by staging fake accident with paid-witnesses standing by to serve in court trials if needed. After a few examples, this one concentrates on the 'gutter-floppers."
metadata.Writer: Houston Branch, Joseph L. Mankiewicz, John B. Clymer
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Wynne Gibson, William Gargan
